Text.val: 27.09.2013 GB SCR18132 Changed calculation of the Step 5 : Calculation of Net stock facility (client group)
12.07.2011 SH SCR16596 Extended updates of maximum stockfinance
06.06.2011 SH SCR16235 Removed update of CSTO fields which are only selected for
14.04.2011 JOH SCR16366 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
07.12.2009 SH SCR15150 Changed access of CMON from Write to Read
07.04.2009 SH SCR14516 Added CMON_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC for calc of
maximum stck finance (for one client and also for client group)
23.05.2007 SH SCR12538 Step4 Replaced hardcode substractions with -20 by
22.04.2006 SH SCR11012 Diff. Changes (updates of v.DelayInStockListReceipt ,
12.04.2006 AS SCR#10927 fixed open modes for table CLNT
13.07.2005 AK SCR8569 added maxlimum limit as percentage of debtor finence
09.09.2003 JJ SCR4306 added maxlimit limit po.NETSTOCKFACILITY (CLNT403_MAX..)
fill output parameters with zeros and exit
initialize workfields with data from table
step 1: calculate the total of the deductions
step 2: deduct the deductions from the stock amount
step 3: calculation of gross stock facility
step 5: calculation of net stock facility
-- only if V.MAXSTOCKFINANCEC > 0 and V.MAXSTOCKFINANCEC < PO.NETSTOCKFACILITY
Check : client is a part of a gruop
Check : Maximum stockfinance as percentage of debtor finance(one client)
Only if client is part of a group

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY) as decimal(13,2)) from :6/CMON join :6/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMON_CLNTNO where CMON_YEAR = :1 and CMON_MONTH = :2 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':3' and CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :4 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=:5 and CMON_CLNTNO <> :7

Text.val: Maximum stockfinance as percentage of debtor finance(one client)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAFACTORING) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum(ACCC_MUTAEXTRAFIN) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/ACCC where ACCC_ACCT_DATE = ':2' and ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :3 and ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :4 and ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 for fetch only
SELECT Count(*) FROM :3/CLNT AS CLNT WHERE CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=:1 and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=:2 for fetch only

SELECT cast (sum (CMON.CMON_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY)as decimal(13,2)) as STOKFINH, cast(sum(CMON.CMON_CURRBALFACTACC * CLNT402_ADVANCE / 100) + sum(CMON.CMON_CURRBALEXTRAFINACC) as decimal (13,2)) as DEBFINH FROM :6/CMON AS CMON JOIN :6/CLNT AS CLNT on CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO=CMON.CMON_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO=CMON.CMON_CLNTNO WHERE CMON.CMON_YEAR =:1 and CMON.CMON_MONTH =:2 and CMON.CMON_CURRENCY=':3' and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=:4 and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=:5

select B.CLNT108_ACC_CURR, cast (sum (A.ACCC_MUTAFACTORING * B.CLNT402_ADVANCE / 100) + sum(A.ACCC_MUTAEXTRAFIN * B.CLNT415_MAXPERCDEBTFINANCE / 100) as decimal (13,2)) as SQL_AMOUNT from :1/ACCC A join :1/CLNT B on B.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO=:2 and B.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO=:3 where A.ACCC_ACCT_DATE=':4' and A.ACCC_MUTTYPE > 95 and A.ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=B.CLNT101_ADMNO and A.ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO=B.CLNT102_CLNTNO group by B.CLNT108_ACC_CURR order by B.CLNT108_ACC_CURR for fetch only
